mapper.select: SELECT domain, sum(count) as count, TRUNC( sum(count) * 100.0 / ( select sum(total.count) from (SELECT sum(count) as count FROM dns_query_status WHERE ( created_at >= now() - interval '10 min') GROUP BY domain ORDER BY count DESC ) total ) +0.05, 1) as percentage FROM dns_query_status WHERE ( created_at >= now() - interval '10 min') GROUP BY domain ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 100;
